title: Cold Light
description: The end of the world brings chaos, madness, and psychic powers. For Emma and Arthur, separated by an ocean, it brings a love that demands everything. Emma's daughter is kidnapped by raiders, and Emma embarks on a soul-crushing journey to rescue her. When Arthur finds Emma, can she trust him? Against impossible odds, Emma goes to the rogue camp, where she confronts the deepest choice of her heart.
author: Traci L. Slatton
